pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pysassA simple wrapper on[libsass-python pysassc](https://sass.github.io/libsass-python/pysassc.html)to add watch capability using watchdog.## Features- add `-w` and `--watch` flags to `pysassc` command.- watch included directories and source directory recursively.- only watch `*.scss` files.- throttling.## Install```$ pip install pysass```## UsageUse `pysass` command instead of `pysassc` in order to use `-w` or`--watch` flag additionaly to those provided by[libsass-python pysassc](https://sass.github.io/libsass-python/pysassc.html).eg.```$ pysass -t compressed -I node_modules/skeleton-scss/scss/ \-m ./project/src/main.scss ./project/dist/style.css --watch```
